thread.title: Charlotte Crosby goes makeup-free at the airport with Stephen Bear after fans slammed her for 'ruining her face'
thread.title_full: Charlotte Crosby goes makeup-free at the airport with Stephen Bear after fans slammed her for 'ruining her face'

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: Charlotte Crosby goes makeup-free at the airport with Stephen Bear after fans slammed her for 'ruining her face'
text:
Get daily   
Charlotte Crosby has landed back in the UK with a bump after her romantic holiday with Stephen Bear in the Dominican Republic. 
The Geordie Shore star went makeup-free as she arrived back in London. 
She wore her long blonde hair in messy plaited pigtails as she hauled her suitcase through arrivals. 
Wearing her grey jogging bottoms with a burgandy hoodie and flip flops, it looked like Charlotte couldn't care less about keeping up her usual groomed appearance – opting for comfort over style. Charlotte Crosby went makeup-free as she arrived back in the UK (Photo: FameFlynet UK Tel : +44 (0)20 3551 5049 Email : info@fameflynet.uk.com) 
And it's just as well she has a thick skin because Charlotte has been getting a lot of flak on Instagram about her appearance recently. 
Many fans have accused the star of going "too far" with surgery and said that she's "ruined" her face. 
"Please stop it with the lips," one fan begged. 
"So sad that we live in an era where people actually make themselves fake fair enough you want to get some work done but doing it again and again makes you into someone completely different," another added. Charlotte and her boyfriend Stephen Bear arrive back in London (Photo: FameFlynet UK Tel : +44 (0)20 3551 5049 Email : info@fameflynet.uk.com) Charlotte was criticised for her appearance in her holiday selfies (Photo: FameFlynet UK Tel : +44 (0)20 3551 5049 Email : info@fameflynet.uk.com) 
"Omg she has messed her face up," a third fan wrote. 
Another added: "The G Shore girls have gone too far, Charlotte has ruined her face!" 
Mirror Online have contacted Charlotte's representative for comment. 
Meanwhile, things look like they're getting serious for Charlotte and her boyfriend - after he presented her with a massive diamond ring on holiday. 
Charlotte even confessed that Stephen splashed the cash in the hotel shop, which everyone knows is about 300 times the price of a regular shop. 
"Stephen surprised me with a huge diamond ring while we were around the pool," Charlotte told OK! Magazine . "I'd seen it in the jewellery shop in the hotel but it was far too expensive." Stephen and Charlotte - are they taking things to the next level? (Photo: MTV) Nothing says romance more than a lean against a railing (Photo: charlottegshore/Instagram) 
Flashy. But you can't put a price on love, right? Thankfully Charlotte's revealed that some of their exotic exploits haven't involved sackloads of cash. 
"One night we got drunk on the beach and it started pouring down with rain," she continued to OK. "We stayed all night and kissed in the rain. It was like a movie." 
Last week, Stephen revealed he had his eye on the perfect dazzler for his girlfriend after they were spotted looking at rings – and it's bear-shaped, of course. Charlotte said they had a lovely time on holiday and snogged in the rain (Photo: PA) Stephen and Charlotte have talked about engagement and babies already (Photo: Instagram) 
"[I'll spend] a f
